events.text: Seike spies on Wayneth throught an orb
So, he did it? He killed my twin sister Cikeyki? shes speaking to her servants

Then I must have my revenge. I must make him suffer. And after he is gone, I will take over the the whole world! Servants! Bring me the scroll!
Servants bring her an ancient scroll
You will feel the pain of the curse I am about to give you with this scroll Wayneth!
She opens the scroll that contains strange symbols and a weird pentagram in the middle and begin the ritual with the symbols, pentagram, her hand, and her eyes to glow with color magenta
The world is returning back to normal after Cikeyki's attempt to take over the world.
As ciyuna finishes her sentence and turns away from Wayneth, he pulls out a mirror and dissapears in thin air
Wayneth? Wayneth where did you go? Wayneth! I'm not in the mood for hide and seek!
Wayneth wakes up in the same place he was but just reflected
He looks around and sees another self, that does everything he does but just reflected.
Wayneth waves to him and his reflection waves back
Acts like a reflection but not in a mirror? Thats weird.
Wayneth walks up to the mirror twin while the mirror twin does the same
What happens if I'll have a physical contact with you?
Wayneth has physical contact with Wayneth and they both get pulled into each other fusing into one
Well this is interesting. I guess I can split into myself and a reflection and fuse back when I'd like to. Hm? What is that? Looks like a portal over there.
